Title: Update to latest OpenZeppelin version
Content:
The project uses version [1.1.0 of OpenZeppelin](https://github.com/decentraland/mana/blob/master/package.json#L10). [Version 1.2.0](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/zeppelin-solidity/releases/tag/v1.2.0) was released a few days ago, which fixes ERC20 compliance. We recommend updating OpenZeppelin to 1.2.0, by changing the required version in *package.json*.


**EDIT:** fixed in commit [`03ab3fe4567227569d778955f8e36b12b3d46898`](https://github.com/decentraland/mana/commit/03ab3fe4567227569d778955f8e36b12b3d46898).
